html:
6.3.21  2:01 am   what was the latest dream that you remember about?

      i was watching nirvana interviews, and they said in the early stages they were greatly influenced by chuck norris. "chuck norris was everything, to the early Nirvana"

6.3.21  12:47 am   hey bill, i have realised recently that all i want to do is make music, but because im apparently smart (whatever that means), to not go and do some sort of science or academic thing would be a 'waste'. how should i deal with this?

      first you should realize that the second part of what you said (the 'waste' part) is not true

6.2.21  11:59 pm   Is the first word of your next song "my"?

~ Jenna

      no

6.2.21  11:29 pm   why does the song "it's gonna be alright" make me want to cry even harder?

     maybe because it's ...... true

     it sounds positive..... a bit too positive. so positive, it makes me want to cry.

6.2.21  10:51 pm   are you cool

      let me perform some calculations

6.2.21  10:37 pm   heyo. i thought up some great lyrics and a solid melody in the shower. soo how do i find the right chords to back it up?? 

      it's the same way that you knew which words to use to write this question: you just magically know. But, if you feel like you can't do this yet, make sure you save the melody for later when you can. and then in the meantime just start using a chordal instrument throughout your daily life. you'll learn this language just the way you learned the language you wrote this question in. then some time in the future when you're ready, you'll find that melody again and you'll know just what to do

6.2.21  10:26 pm   What is your favourite chords?

      F

6.2.21  10:03 pm   Do you have any spiritual practice bill?

      everything is already spiritual. there's nothing i can do about that

6.2.21  9:45 pm   is the name of your next song "got to know what's going on?"

      no

6.2.21  6:26 pm   Why is mediocrity everywhere?

      to provide a canvas, for the extraordinary

6.2.21  2:11 pm   thoughts on marching bands?

      technology has replaced both the marching and the band

6.2.21  12:14 pm   what caused you to shift to 3d graphics?

      wanted to see around corners

6.2.21  10:01 am   Why is there a boat in so many of your songs/videos?

     i'm not sure

     What does it mean?

     you can cross water more efficiently than swimming

6.2.21  9:24 am   will your next song mention the sky 

      no, but i'm clearly thinking about it

6.2.21  9:08 am   What is the first letter of the 7th word in the next song?

      d

6.2.21  4:37 am   which part would you say is the 'chorus' of I'm a princess? 

      the instrumental riff

6.2.21  12:57 am   whenever i write melodies for songs, i always use the same chord progression, and its been getting hella repetitive lately. do you have any tips for good chord progressions that compliment a certain melody (the key signature is c minor, if that helps)

      i think it's time to think about the words, concepts, and situations in your song. then just let the chords follow the story

6.1.21  8:42 pm   what do you think of angel numbers? when you see certain numbers like on digital clock, the idea is that they have meanings. there are websites that have written interpretations for all the numbers. i've been taken astray in these, and i'm afraid if they're bullshit that i'll end up doing the wrong things. like right now it's 8:38. surely that has some significance. oh yes it means i'm currently on the right path in life. so it this the angels saying that i'm right to listen to them, or is it just generalized bullshit that's made to seem 'potentially legit to some degree'? i've been trying to answer this question by looking them up for a while now and i'm still not 100% sure either way. at the very least it's well written bullshit

      if you have to look it up somewhere else, then it must not be a very strong angel, or at least it doesn't seem to have very strong direct communicational abilities with you. if the communication is legit then you should find it a little more obvious. Then again, it's also important to remember that the communication is not happening through the number. the number is stimulating your mind/brain, to allow some genuine communication to arise. it will feel angelic because everything is angelic

6.1.21  8:13 pm   Is the first word in the title of your song "made"?

      no

6.1.21  6:00 pm   why is there so much bad news

      because it catches your attention easily

6.1.21  5:18 pm   How to use spoon?

      hit it with a second spoon, in a percussive manner

6.1.21  5:17 pm   Where do you find the inspiration for your music?

      i have a basket to catch the inspiration but sometimes the basket itself inspires me

6.1.21  2:33 pm   You said that you don't "feel pressured to make music based on what your fans expect from you", but at the end of "here comes the sun", you say "if this song ain't good enough i'll erase it", which means you do.

      no it doesn't

6.1.21  12:01 pm   isn't it complete bullshit when a written school assignment has a length requirement?

     yes. this is to teach you the skill of bullshit

     like can't i answer the question, but without having to come up with more words to make it long?

     i guess it depends if you think you are writing to a real audience

6.1.21  9:13 am   Do different notes which are played on a piano give different feelings?

      yes, especially if multiple notes are used together, in different patterns

6.1.21  8:08 am   on your songs page, it says "im a princess" was before "here comes the sun," but "im a princess" was released after "here comes the sun." why is that?

      the "i'm a princess" song was made first. but for the video, i fell deep into the rabbit hole of 3D graphics, then i moved to a whole new video system. and by the time i re-gained my composure i decided it was better to do a new song all the way through first, on the new system. because i knew i wanted to keep the old stuff on the princess video but i was in no mood to go back and work on the old systsem, so i knew i would have to 'finish' the princess video on the new system, and i just didn't want to attempt such a strange 'frankenstein' project for the first run.

6.1.21  6:33 am   should i try to write down everything i know

      sure

6.1.21  4:18 am   will your next song be about all the questions people have asked you about what your next song will be about?

      no





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

5.31.21  11:20 pm   what do you use to synthesize your voice

      my vocal chords

5.31.21  9:36 pm   Did you enjoy animating 3-D you in "I'm a princess"?

     sometimes

     How was it?

     it was a dramatic journey, with ups and downs, spanning the course of almost 2 years

5.31.21  9:07 pm   is that a mcdonald's in your latest video or is it just a yellow m

      it represents a mcdonalds

5.31.21  6:29 pm   What influenced your music style

      time and space

5.31.21  5:23 pm   what's your favorite line in "i'm a princess?" there are just so many that stick out to me, what do you think

      tell it to me once before i'm gone

5.31.21  5:14 pm   what is your favourite fact about alexander the great?

      i only knew 1 fact about him but i just realized that might be an opinion

5.31.21  5:12 pm   how do you do it to not let others expectations of you alter the work you do?

      it all comes down to the power of free will, which conveniently is not a hoax

5.31.21  3:26 pm   the notebook and reality sections of this website seem very closely tied together, does it feel wrong to you that they're so far away from each other?

      no

5.31.21  2:30 pm   what is going on exactly with the time signatures in slow down?

      it's all in 4 except the entire ending section (starting at "going very very really slowly now") which alternates between 4 and 3, or it could be 7 if you don't mind your bars being huge

5.31.21  11:53 am   does 'land of the 2 letter words' really exist in real life? or is it just an imaginary land?

      as you climb the ranks of the professional scrabble community, you will find it very much exists

5.31.21  9:06 am   does your next song contain the word "dream?"

     yes

      if so, how many times?

     you probably wouldn't believe me if i told you

5.31.21  6:29 am   what does our ueqstions look like on your screen? like your perspective when you answer and see them

      it looks like this

5.31.21  6:10 am   time is divided into weeks and each week contains 7 days. do you like this division?

     mostly, although sometimes i wish it was a little longer

     do you have special feelings for different days of the week?

     conceptually yes, but the actual feeling of a day is usually defined by more than just the week schedule

5.31.21  5:26 am   Do you pronounce ketchup as catsup

      no

5.31.21  4:22 am   What was your main source for learning arrangement/harmonization?

      songs

5.31.21  1:20 am   how many songs/songideas do you throw away on average before finishing and making a video for one?

      0

5.31.21  12:02 am   I'm learning how to play piano, I learn the key C right now, what next key or notes you suggest for the beginners like me

      try to play some songs you know

5.30.21  9:11 pm   Looking at your songs list, it seems to me that you're free to do whatever you want to is the absolute milestone in your work. It marks the end of your early amateur efforts and blasts into utter professionalism. It sounds like any of your 2018 songs. How did this giant leap forward happen?

      what you might be hearing, in the recording, is more of a willingness to pursue complete vocal harmonies. Typically what happened previously, when doing a full length song, is, by the time i get the regular vocal all done and set, i have no energy left to actually deal with all the vocal harmonies. Because it is a lot of work to do vocal harmonies. but around 2015 i started recognizing the importance of following through with that, and i prioritized it much more, and developed some effecient procedures for working through this. and almost every recording since then has used a significant amount of vocal harmonies. however it should be mentioned that the writing for that song was mostly done in 2010

5.30.21  7:19 pm   Does the Gsus chord have anything to do with jesus

     sometimes, if it's used in songs about jesus

     or was jesus just named after the chord?

      no

5.30.21  5:53 pm   what are some other fields you think are cool beyond music, history

      quantum mechanics

5.30.21  4:11 pm   how do you feel about photogrammetry

      pretty good

5.30.21  12:14 pm   Do you think some people can go insane to your songs?

      i don't see why not
